script:
1). In which year were you born?
On February 28th.
In Los Angeles.
In 1992. 
2). Where were you yesterday?
I was at an all-day conference. 
I'm going to special training.
I will be out tomorrow.
3). Shouldn't we pay before we leave?
Yes, we should have paid.
No, I don't like to pray.
No, they'll bill us later.
